title.narrative: Mali Rural Electrification Hybrid System Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to expand access to modern energy services in rural areas of the Recipient and to increase renewable energy generation in target areas.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Accounting Software | Description :The Project Implementing Entity has purchased and installed a new accountingsoftware factoring in its ability to generate financial statements.

Finance Agreement :Appointment of External Auditor | Description :The Project Implementing Entity has appointed an externalfinancial auditor for the Project under terms of reference, and qualifications, and with experience satisfactory to the Association.

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of Procurement Specialist | Description :The Project Implementing Entity has appointed a procurementspecialist for the Project, under terms of reference, and with qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association.
